snippet: A Postal Service spokesman said the quotation on the stamp, which was written by another author, had been popularized by Ms. Angelou and held great meaning to her.
abstract: United States Postal Service issues stamp honoring author Maya Angelou that features quote from book of poems by Joan Walsh Anglund; does not plan to reissue stamp, saying quote was meaningful to Angelou and that she is publicly identified with it.
lead_paragraph: A Postal Service spokesman said the quotation on the stamp, which was written by another author, had been popularized by Ms. Angelou and held great meaning to her.

headline.main: Postal Service Won’t Reissue Maya Angelou Stamp
headline.print_headline: Stamp Is Maya Angelou’s, but Words Are Another’s

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings (Book)
